p: In addition to suicidal thoughts, women also revealed that their burdens could affect their ART adherence. Ruth explained that “if you are depressed, you cannot manage to do those things [take ART medication] because of the depression and you’re hurt in your heart every day, because when someone is depressed the heart always hurts. For you to be bothered about your life, you just say whatever happens will happen.” Women’s PND resulted in hopelessness, which could lead them to either forget to take their medication or to lack the motivation to go to the clinic. At the same time, Ruth said that women often think too much when they have PND, and it is harder to remember one’s medication when one has so many thoughts.
